long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Close open tabs by url pattern - do you find yourself with too many tabs trying to close some but don't know which? do you have too many automatically opened tabs, for example from your Zoom meetings?

If the answer is "Yes!" then this extension is made for you - just put the url pattern you want to close and all open tabs with this pattern will be closed.

For example, "https://www.zoom.us/*" will close all open zoom tabs
